com.ramineqbal.personbackend.service

Class PersonService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ramineqbal.personbackend.service.PersonService

  • @Service
public class PersonService
extends Object
    PersonService class, annotated with Service (origin: org.springframework.stereotype.Service) Used as intermediary class between PersonRepository (Database-Interface) and PersonController (API-Controller) and essentially implements the functionality of the methods invoked by the API.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AddressRepository addressRepository
      This is the repository interface to the AddressRepository used as a Data Access Layer to the Database; Will be dependency injected by Spring into this object; Is used to map already existing databases to newly added persons before creating a new address
      private PersonRepository personRepository
      This is the repository interface to the PersonRepository used as a Data Access Layer to the Database; Will be dependency injected by Spring into this object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PersonService(PersonRepository personRepo, AddressRepository addressRepository)
      Constructor in which the dependecy injections are instantiated

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Adds a person to the database.

      Deletes a Person from the Database based on the ID: Query: DELETE FROM PERSON WHERE id={id}

      Queries for all Person Entries in the Database

      Queries for a person, conditioning the result by the id

    • Field Detail

      • personRepository

        private final PersonRepository personRepository
        This is the repository interface to the PersonRepository used as a Data Access Layer to the Database; Will be dependency injected by Spring into this object

      • addressRepository

        private final AddressRepository addressRepository
        This is the repository interface to the AddressRepository used as a Data Access Layer to the Database; Will be dependency injected by Spring into this object; Is used to map already existing databases to newly added persons before creating a new address

    • Constructor Detail

      • PersonService

        @Autowired
public PersonService(PersonRepository personRepo,
                                AddressRepository addressRepository)
        Constructor in which the dependecy injections are instantiated

    • Method Detail

      • addPerson

        @Transactional
public Person addPerson(Person person)
        Adds a person to the database. If the Address Information within the Person Object contains an address that matches an address in the database, then the according database object will be mapped to that specific person
        Parameters:
        person - The Person Object that is to be added to the database
        Returns:
        The Person Object that has been added to the Database

      • findAll

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public List<Person> findAll()
        Queries for all Person Entries in the Database
        Returns:
        List of all Persons that have a record in the database

      • updatePerson

        @Transactional
public Person updatePerson(Person person)
        Updates a Person in the Database based on all containing attributes/keys of the Person object
        Parameters:
        person - A Person Object that will be compared to an existing Person object in the database and overwritten
        Returns:
        The instance of the updated Person Object.

      • findPersonById

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public Person findPersonById(Long id)
        Queries for a person, conditioning the result by the id
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the person that is queried for
        Returns:
        The instance of the person that has the specified id

      • deletePerson

        @Transactional
public void deletePerson(Long id)
        Deletes a Person from the Database based on the ID: Query: DELETE FROM PERSON WHERE id={id}
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the person that is to be deleted
